note.p: Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1907 vol 79 pp xxxi-xxxiv signed by T R R S

Notes: Birth place described as Kennington in DNB - but it is not specified whether this is the town in Kent or Kennington in Lambeth, London. The latter seems more likely. According to his obituary in Proceedings, he was known simply as George Bond Howes.
